verbose_text: The aim of the present study was to clarify d-GalN / LPS-induced hepatocyte apoptotic changes and the related gene expression using serum analysis, histopathological and immunohistochemical analyses, DNA ladder detection, terminal deoxynucleotidyl transferase mediated dUTP nick end labeling (TUNEL) detection, western blot analysis, flow cytometry and electron microscopy analysis.
